import { Fragment, useState } from 'react' import { TabContent, TabPane, Nav, NavItem, NavLink } from 'reactstrap' const TabsCentered = () => { const [active, setActive] = useState('1') const toggle = tab => { if (active !== tab) { setActive(tab) } } return (
{ toggle('1') }} > Home { toggle('2') }} > Service Disabled { toggle('3') }} > Account
